name: Superhotlike
description:
Superhotlike started as a small roguelike tribute to Superhot.

Game is turn-based on a 5x5 grid. When you move, your shots (and the enemies!) move. Beware. 

To shoot, use the button in the center of the arrow buttons and select where to shoot at 

(Tip: Instead of clicking the arrow buttons, you can use the arrow keys to move!)

Enemies have 3 hp. You have only one.

Kill every enemy and collect every item drop to get to the next enemy wave.

Try to survive 5 waves (and all the bugs too).

Note: While making it, we really like the idea of offsetting shots from tile centers. We think the whole thing could be really interesting to explore (add more shot modifiers, level your shot stats, enemy variety, etc.) 

#7drl is an amazing experience everyone!

Credits:

Art: Fernando Martínez Ruppel

Game Design and Development: @NicoSaraintaris

Superhotlike is a small #7drl game by Beavl.
